Numbers_Words_bg._initDigits (  ) 

Fills the _digits array for masculine and feminine genders with corresponding references to neuter words (when they're the same).

Returns:
void
private
Author:
Kouber Saparev <kouber@php.net>

Numbers_Words_bg._showDigitsGroup ( $  num,
$  gender = 0,
$  last = false 
)

Converts a three-digit number to its word representation in Bulgarian language.

Parameters:
integer $num An integer between 1 and 999 inclusive.
integer $gender An integer which represents the gender of the current digits group. 0 - neuter 1 - masculine -1 - feminine
boolean $last A flag that determines if the current digits group is the last one.
Returns:
string The words for the given number.
private
Author:
Kouber Saparev <kouber@php.net>

Numbers_Words_bg.toWords ( $  num = 0  ) 

Converts a number to its word representation in Bulgarian language.

Parameters:
integer $num An integer between 9.99*-10^302 and 9.99*10^302 (999 centillions) that need to be converted to words
Returns:
string The corresponding word representation
public
Author:
Kouber Saparev <kouber@php.net>

Numbers_Words_bg.$_misc_strings

Initial value:

 array(
        'deset'=>'десет',           // "ten"
        'edinadeset'=>'единадесет', // "eleven"
        'na'=>'на',                 // liaison particle for 12 to 19
        'sto'=>'сто',               // "hundred"
        'sta'=>'ста',               // suffix for 2 and 3 hundred
        'stotin'=>'стотин',         // suffix for 4 to 9 hundred
        'hiliadi'=>'хиляди'         // plural form of "thousand"
    )

Numbers_Words_bg.$_digits

Initial value:

 array(
        0=>array(1=>"едно", "две", "три", "четири", "пет", "шест", "седем", "осем", "девет"), // neuter
        1=>array(1=>'един', 'два'),                                                           // masculine
       -1=>array(1=>'една')                                                                   // feminine
    )
